nodes.text: The Jovan Station was a space station located in the Jovan system.

The Jovan Station was the primary Galactic Republic space station in the Gordian Reach during the Clone Wars, and was a stopping point for travelers from Phindar to the Auril sector. It was a very important element in the commerce of the Jovan system. Eight bulk freighters, and later Star Destroyers, could dock at the station simultaneously.
In 19 BBY, Jedi Master Yoda bought the B-7 light freighter Nighthawk in a junkyard on Jovan Station.
After the Battle of Yavin, the Jovan Station became the headquarters of Admiral Amise Griff's blockade of the neighboring Yavin system. This seriously affected the commerce of the entire system.
